net.adamcin.oakpal.core.checks

Class JcrProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.checks.JcrProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProgressCheckFactory

    public class JcrProperties
extends Object
implements ProgressCheckFactory
    A complex check for enforcing characteristics of JCR Properties of imported nodes and their descendants within the scope of the workspace filter.

    Configuration options:

    scopePaths (Rule[])
    A list of rules, with each pattern matched against an import path, and the type (Rule.RuleType) of the last matching rule determines whether the matched path is in scope for checking the properties on the node and its descendants.
    denyNodeTypes
    A list of nodeType strings, which specify primary or mixin types that should be disallowed. If matched, the path is marked as a violation, without descending further to children and without evaluating property checks.
    scopeNodeTypes
    A list of nodeType strings, which specify primary or mixin types that the list of property constraints should apply to.
    properties
    A list of JcrPropertyConstraints definitions.
         "config": {
         "scopePaths": [
             {
                 "pattern": "/apps/.*",
                 "type": "allow"
             },
             {
                 "pattern": "/libs/.*",
                 "type": "allow"
             }
         ],
         "denyNodeTypes": ["sling:OsgiConfig"],
         "scopeNodeTypes": ["{http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0}Component"],
         "properties": [
             {
                 "name": "{http://sling.apache.org/jcr/sling/1.0}resourceType",
                 "denyIfPresent": true
             },
             {
                 "name": "componentGroup",
                 "denyIfAbsent": true,
                 "denyIfMultivalued": true
             },
             {
                 "name": "sling:resourceSuperType",
                 "valueRules": [{
                     "pattern": "[^/].*",
                     "type": "deny"
                 }]
             }
         ]
     }
